items.sentence: Tom persuaded Mary to go to the dance with him.
Tom pointed to a chair and told me to sit down.
I want to dance at my granddaughter\'s wedding.
You\'re going to have to quit skipping classes.
You\'re likely the only person who can do that.
I guess I felt like eating something different.
I had a problem with my car on the way to work.
I must talk to you about what needs to be done.
I suspect that Tom had nothing to do with that.
I closed my suitcase and tied a rope around it.
